title: browser update deleted all my data with bookmarks
content: I have no access to all my bookmarks and the damn backup folder is empty, what kind of trash is this, I need this for my work and not even the search history is avalable, no more damn firefox, let me know if there is any way to get back that bookmarks and browser data since I have no way of retrieving any of the cinfidental accesses I need to perform my job

title: ¿cómo sé el número de windos xp de mi ordenador
content: me dice que nopuedo usar MOZilla si no tengo al menos el XP7
creator: conchadelolmo

title: Stop redirect warning and just automatically redirect.
content:
I've been lead to believe in previous editions of firefox you could turn off the redirect message and instead just allow firefox to redirect.

However now (as of 112.0.1) i can't find any way to do this. I repeatedly get redirect message and i would prefer the browser just do the redirect instead of having my click a link. I know exactly where the redirect is coming from and i have no problem with it and i don't need it to have a warning.
creator: Neopopulas

title: macOS: Make "About Firefox" visible in "Application menu" > "help"
content:
Recently I got a Mac computer and I installed Firefox in it. I can't find "About Firefox" in Application Menu.

How to show it in Application Menu like Windows and Linux?
creator: hsinyuanp_xavier

title: lost all firefox history
content: i removed the hard drive from my computer and added it to my new computer with the expectation that I wouldn't have to reload all my programs. It didn't work so I reinstalled the drive to the old computer. for reasons unknown Firefox refused to load data on any of my sites. So I reinstalled Firefox. It works fine except I don't have history, can't access my passwords or my bookmarks HELP!
creator: nikipasricha

title: How to bypass "User Gesture is Required"?
content: There is an application which is launched by a script in Firefox. Basically it launches a print job. Unfortunately the application can't launch since Firefox says "User Gesture is Required". We temporarily added a button for a user gesture to be recorded but ultimately we don't want this button here. Is there any setting where we can bypass this "User Gesture is Required" check?
creator: lecapitainehaddock

title: NON ACTIVE QANTAS FREQUENT FLYER LOGIN TAG
content: Qantas frequent flyer log in(shows both business reward log in(active) and frequent flyer log in (not active) in emails from QANTAS. emails are Outlook (Hotmail) opened in Firefox (MOZILLA). I do not have the business rewards membership but am FREQUENT FLYER member -- the same email , when opened in Google or on my android phone will have the ff log in tag active and will open. I have cleared (in Firefox) QANTAS cookies, site data and cache but the problem, as above, still exists . Please help SRL sloynes@hotmail.com
creator: sloynes
